poem.body:
A House upon the Hight -- That Wagon never reached -- No Dead, were ever carried down -- No Peddler's Cart -- approached --
Whose Chimney never smoked -- Whose Windows -- Night and Morn -- Caught Sunrise first -- and Sunset -- last -- Then -- held an Empty Pane --
Whose fate -- Conjecture knew -- No other neighbor -- did -- And what it was -- we never lisped -- Because He -- never told --
